KeyFeatures.title: Rafeeq Features
KeyFeatures.desc: Everything you need in one app to simplify your daily worship, from prayer times to Quran, supplications, and more.
KeyFeatures.Quran: Listen to the Holy Quran with your favorite reciters in a seamless experience.
KeyFeatures.PrayerTimes: Get accurate prayer times based on your location.
KeyFeatures.nearstMasjid: Find the nearest mosque to perform your prayers easily.
KeyFeatures.AzkarDoaa: A trusted collection of supplications and prophetic hadiths in one place.
